name: Kettlebell Exercises
description: Dynamic strength and power exercises using kettlebells

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.description: Explosive hip hinge movement. Builds power, cardiovascular fitness, posterior chain strength.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width, kettlebell on ground in front
Hinge at hips, grab kettlebell with both hands
Hike kettlebell back between legs like hiking a football
Explosively drive hips forward, swinging kettlebell up
Let momentum carry kettlebell to chest/shoulder height
Don't lift with arms - power comes from hips
Let kettlebell swing back down, hinge at hips to catch it

modifications.easier: Lighter weight, reduce reps, focus on form not speed
modifications.harder: Heavier weight, single-arm swings, American swing (overhead)

conditions.lower_back: Master hip hinge first, start very light, may need to avoid
conditions.shoulder: Ensure kettlebell not going too high, reduce range

exercises.name: Kettlebell Goblet Squat
exercises.description: Front-loaded squat. Builds lower body strength, teaches squat pattern.
instructions: Hold kettlebell by horns at chest height
Elbows point down, keep bell close to chest
Feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly out
Squat down, elbows track inside knees
Descend until thighs parallel or below
Keep chest up, weight in heels
Drive through heels to stand

modifications.easier: Lighter weight, reduce depth, box squat
modifications.harder: Heavier weight, pause at bottom, single-leg (pistol squat)

conditions.knee: Reduce depth, lighter weight, focus on control

exercises.name: Turkish Get-Up
exercises.description: Full-body movement from ground to standing. Builds stability, strength, coordination.
instructions: Lie on back, hold kettlebell in right hand, arm extended
Bend right knee, foot flat on floor
Roll onto left elbow, keeping eyes on kettlebell
Push up to left hand, staying tall
Lift hips, sweep left leg back to kneeling position
Stand up while keeping kettlebell overhead
Reverse the movement to return to start

modifications.easier: Practice without weight first, use shoe as target
modifications.harder: Heavier weight, increase reps, pause at each position

conditions.shoulder: Start very light or bodyweight, may need physio clearance
conditions.wrist: Use lighter weight, may need wrist supports

exercises.name: Kettlebell Deadlift
exercises.description: Hip hinge pattern with kettlebell. Teaches proper lifting mechanics.
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width, kettlebell on ground between feet
Hinge at hips, push butt back, keep back flat
Grab kettlebell with both hands
Drive through heels, extend hips to stand
Squeeze glutes at top, stand tall
Lower with control, hinging at hips
Keep kettlebell close to body throughout

modifications.easier: Elevate kettlebell on blocks, lighter weight
modifications.harder: Heavier weight, single-leg deadlift, deficit deadlift

conditions.lower_back: Focus on hip hinge, keep back neutral, start light

exercises.name: Kettlebell Clean
exercises.description: Explosive pull to rack position. Power development, functional strength.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width, kettlebell on ground
Hinge to grab kettlebell with one hand
Swing kettlebell back between legs
Explosively extend hips, pull kettlebell to shoulder
Catch in rack position - bell rests on forearm
Keep wrist straight, elbow close to ribs
Lower with control and repeat

modifications.easier: Lighter weight, practice rack position first, two-hand clean
modifications.harder: Heavier weight, double kettlebell clean, clean and press

conditions.wrist: Focus on soft catch, may need wrist supports
conditions.shoulder: Ensure proper rack position, may need lighter weight
